sentences.english: You have killed that man; that's all right. I have the key.
sentences.chinese: 你杀了人，好罢，我呢，我有钥匙。

sentences.english: Hong account cluster rows slim, lovely lilies to wear worship strike.
sentences.chinese: 香帐簇成排窈窕，金针穿罢拜婵娟。

sentences.english: After lunch, Kizuki suggested we skip classes and go play pool or something.
sentences.chinese: 用罢午餐，木月提议把课翘了，去打桌球或干点别的。

sentences.english: Say, several big fellow BangMen went there.
sentences.chinese: 说罢，几个大汉往旁门那边去了。

sentences.english: Putting it bluntly , this is dream talk.
sentences.chinese: 老实说罢，这是自欺欺人的梦话。

sentences.english: Vivid description of the teacher to read these words up.
sentences.chinese: 说罢老师就绘声绘色地读了起来。

sentences.english: As the government of the South Sung Dynasty stabilized, the bowmen were removed during the 4th year of Shaoxing.
sentences.chinese: 随著南宋政权趋于稳定，绍兴四年高宗罢废新置弓手。

sentences.english: I wish I had a job to strike from, how sadI do not have one, any spare going now?
sentences.chinese: 我连工作都没有，还罢什么工啊，还有多余的岗位吗？

sentences.english: Sigh, First I will get the Professor back then talk about it.
sentences.chinese: 唉等我先把老夫子取出来再说罢。

sentences.english: Kong Yiji waited for a while, then said earnestly: “You can’t, can you?
sentences.chinese: 孔乙己等了许久，很恳切的说道，“不能写罢？

sentences.english: Over the past years, the "problem foods" appeared one after another.
sentences.chinese: 这几年，问题食品像走马灯似的，你方唱罢我登场。

sentences.english: As they finished breakfast, Dorothy dropped her bombshell .
sentences.chinese: 吃罢早饭，多萝西投下了她的重磅炸弹。

sentences.english: Scholars held for Jiujiang Rong Division auxiliary, You Chang know in Guangzhou, in order to stop things.
sentences.chinese: 举进士，为九江戎司掾，又尝知广州，以事罢。

sentences.english: Say, to cut his sword smoke little brother.
sentences.chinese: 说罢，便抽刀欲切本人的小弟弟。

sentences.english: I have come to this world trark naked, and in the twinkling of an eye, I am to go back as stark naked as ever.
sentences.chinese: 我赤裸裸来到这世界，转眼间也将赤裸裸的回去罢？

sentences.english: Go now, but the men only, and serve Jehovah, since that is what you are requesting.
sentences.chinese: 你们壮年人去事奉耶和华罢，因为这是你们所求的。
